messages.title: On YOUR Side!
messages.content: For the past 18 years I've been honoured to serve the people of Hampstead & Highgate as their MP. Now I seek your support for re-election, this time for the new seat of Hampstead & Kilburn. Representing such a diverse, energetic and exciting constituency is a privilege and never, ever, boring. I've always aimed to reflect my constituent's interests and stood by my principles and beliefs - even when it meant going against my own party. This election is a clear choice between a fairer future under Labour, or a Conservative Party that would favour the wealthy few.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Celebrate our diversity; never let it be exploited by purveyors of fear or hate.
Most parents do a fine job; most kids work hard in school.
End child poverty and help all our people realise their potential.
Creating new jobs; new opportunities; new possibilities.
MPs exist to serve the people. I’m here for YOU!

politicalExperience.achievements: Served the people of Hampstead & Highgate.

contactInformation.address: Glenda Jackson, FREEPOST, The Labour Party, Shirland Mews, London W9 2BR

images.caption: Leaflet with campaign information for Glenda Jackson.
